Package com.fetch.sdetchallenge.pageobjects.pages

Class SdetchallengePage

java.lang.Object
com.fetch.sdetchallenge.pageobjects.base.BasePage
com.fetch.sdetchallenge.pageobjects.pages.SdetchallengePage
public class SdetchallengePage extends BasePage
Page object representing the SDET Challenge page. Provides methods to interact with the page elements and perform actions related to the challenge.
